list: Here's your complete list of API keys.
create: Great! Your new API key has been created successfully.
reset: Perfect! Your API key has been reset and is ready to use.
update: Your API key has been updated successfully.
updateDate: API key dates have been refreshed successfully.
updateStatus: API key status has been updated successfully.
delete: Your API key has been safely removed.

error.notFound: We couldn't locate this API key. Please check and try again.
error.inactive: This API key is currently inactive.
error.expired: This API key has expired. Would you like to create a new one?

xApiKey.required: Please provide your API key to continue.
xApiKey.notFound: We couldn't find this API key in our system.
xApiKey.invalid: Sorry, this API key appears to be invalid.
xApiKey.forbidden: You don't have permission to use this API key.
xApiKey.predefinedNotFound: Predefined API key not found in the system.
